titleStmt.title: Considerations on Mr. Harrington's Common-wealth of Oceana: restrained to the first part of the preliminaries.
titleStmt.author: Wren, M. (Matthew), 1629-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Samuel Gellibrand at the Golden ball in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: The last two leaves are blank.
